title: Help! New client update
body: Hello League Community! I recently downloaded the new client update. After a few games, I logged out. The next day, I launch league of legends, but all there is is a black screen that wont load how long I wait. Can someone help me? Is this a problem with the client update?

replies.body:
Black screens like this can happen on either client version and may be a result of an unstable connection failing to download assets.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever is either blocking or causing unstable comms with our login servers.  

You can also try logging into the legacy client to see if you're receiving any specific error messages:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if you run into any issues.
